title: Boutique New Orleans Hotel - The Chateau Hotel™
text: Boutique New Orleans Hotel Historic French Quarter Charm Stay at New Orleans’ landmark Chateau Hotel, a fully restored 18th-century mansion that echoes the old-world aura of nearby historic French Quarter landmarks. Our hotel promises 24-hour front desk service, on-site self parking, and a serene pool while New Orleans beckons guests to indulge in its storied past. From Café du Monde’s beignets to Preservation Hall’s jazz music, NOLA will awaken all senses when you stay at the Chateau Hotel, where historic indulgence lives around every corner.
